The '''Cypressus Custos Chapter''' is [[Kamisato Ayato]]'s [[Story Quest]].

==Act I: The Firmiana Leaf Falls==
{{Main|The Firmiana Leaf Falls}}
{{Description|Now that the dust has settled, life in [[Inazuma]] is finally returning to normal.<br />Bidding farewell to the old and ringing in the new, two lovers from the [[Tenryou Commission|Tenryou]] and [[Kanjou Commission]]s are also about to step out of their long stymied romance into a greater union.<br />But in the eyes of the Yashiro Commissioner, Kamisato Ayato, this is no mere "wedding"...}}
{{Transclude|The Firmiana Leaf Falls|List of Quests}}
